page.title: 03SOUTH SHIELDS'TOWN HALL
page.content: Inside the {Town Hall}the mayoress is very busy.She goes to very important meetings and meets very special guests.The mayor's parlour has lots of special things that have been given to other mayors in the past.There is a glass cabinet in the mayor's parlour and inside there is a silver cigar box given to a mayor from Jarrow.The mayor wears an 18 carat{gold chain}that she wears when she is mayor for the year.Each year the{Town Hall}chooses a new mayor and the mayor gets the 18 carat {gold chain}.Inside every room there are very clever carvings on the wall and the walls are symmetrical.When you walk into the{ {Town Hall} you'll see that the marble comes from Italy and the wood is all Oak.At the entrance of the {Town Hall} there is a dedication stone engraved with the name of the opener.{
